column3: Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences
column5: Become a proficient data scientist with a master’s in Data Science at the University of Southampton.You’ll study the latest techniques and technologies, including data mining, machine learning, and data visualisation. By the end of your studies, you’ll be able to develop original ideas and solve problems using advanced data science methods. You can apply what you have learned in fields such as data journalism, open government and social media.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
